Posts.Content: Hi Thank you for this information. I had WLE (Grade3 & ER+) & SLNB 10 days ago. I have swelling in my armpit that my BCN & surgeon have put down to surgery after effects rather that the start of Lymphedema. I was originally told I would have 3 weeks of radiotherapy after this initial treatment but a different surgeon performed my surgery and beforehand mentioned chemo. After surgery he said 'it looked messy in there' (my armpit) and said that although the original FNA result (taken 2 months ago) came back negative, it was likely I would need to go back for Lymph Node Clearance. I'll be getting my results on Thursday. I'm already suffering the effects of 'cording' which today reached my lower arm despite doing the exercises every day since the day after surgery. I'll be calling my BCN later to see if there's anything else she or I can do. At least when I go on Thursday I'll have a little more idea about what to expect. As I have a son who is still dependant on me, my life takes priority over my arm but I'll be devastated to lose the use of it as I love to craft/sew etc...... Kind regards
Posts.Title: Lymph node surgery

Posts.Content: Thank you Londonfornow re taking paracetamol prior to cold cap!Â  lynnwad I'm having my 2nd FEC on Tuesday. I took my own conditioner but didn't have/need a headband (didn't know anything about it!). The hair on my head remains intact (so far). I'll be trying the cold cap again but I'm taking a friend with me to help take my minmd off the brainfreeze! lol! Hope all goes well for you!
Posts.Title: Chemo Starts Tomorrow

Posts.Content: Any luck yet @greenhead? I'm still having to take Accord....:(
Posts.Title: Sandoz Letrozole - Boots unable to supply

Posts.Content: Has anyone else had problems getting the Sandoz brand of Letrozole? Boots have been supplying mine for quite a few months but are now saying that their suppliers don't have any. I have had to resort to using Accord instead because this is all they have in stock currently. I'm not a happy bunny!
Posts.Title: Sandoz Letrozole - Boots unable to supply

Posts.Content: Hi! I've spoken to Boots customer services and Unichem (the supplier) - Sandoz brand is not on their list (which includes'specials') and they don't know why! I'm giving up hope! Life on Accord is painful!
Posts.Title: Sandoz Letrozole - Boots unable to supply
